message: Given that my money loses value much faster than yours (20% vs 5% per round), I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering the time pressure affects me more significantly.

I appreciate your proposal, but it doesn't account for the fact that my money is also losing value, albeit at a slower rate. A 55-45 split in my favor is a fair compromise, considering the time pressure is still a factor.

Let's be practical about this. My previous $600K offer is now only worth $480K to me due to 20% inflation, while your $400K would still be worth $380K. Your counter-offer was even worse for me. I'm proposing 70-30 to compensate for the severe depreciation I'm facing. If we continue further, both of us will lose more value.
